data.title: Tourenbeispiele Landhotel Flöhatal
data.text:
Tours

Join us on a journey of discovery through the Ore Mountains.

Over the years Tilo and his experienced tour guides have designed and refined countless tours. Take a look at some of the past tours and get a first impression of what you can expect.

Our tours can be booked from April to October. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us at +49 37361 43 03.

Vogtlandtour- Göltzschlachtalblick

Annaberg-Buchholz: In the hometown of the great computer Adam Ries, you should take a look at his computer school, now a museum.

Geyer: After 400 years of digging in the earth, it collapsed, leaving a 50 meter deep funnel.

Talsperre Pöhl: On the Eisenberg above the dam there is a lookout tower (Mosenturm, named after Julius Mosen) from which you have a beautiful panoramic view.

Das Vogtland: A dream stage

Sächsische-Schweiz-Tour

Elbsandsteingebirge: The Elbe Sandstone Mountains extend on both sides of the Elbe between the Czech city of Decin and the Saxon Pirna.

Glashütte: is a town in the Saxon Switzerland-Eastern Ore Mountains in Saxony and is well known, among other things, for the manufacture of Glashütte watches.

Decin: The city of Decin lies in the transition area between Bohemian Switzerland and the Bohemian low mountains in a valley in which the Ploucnice and the Jilovsky potok flow into the Elbe from the west. With an altitude of 135 m n.m. Decin is the most beautifully situated city in the Czech Republic.

Das Vogtland: A dream Stage
